summary: Essential Housecarls, short EH, is a simple mod that changes all Housecarls to essential so they don't die. You can choose between Vanilla only, Hearthfire only or both. Including an NMM installer.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Description updated: May 8, 2017

Please use [url=http://forum.valixx-online.de]my forum[/url] for support. Thank you.[/center]

[center][url=http://twitter.com/ValixxOnline][img]http://valixx-online.de/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/twitter-small.png[/img][/url][url=http://facebook.com/ValixxOnline][img]http://valixx-online.de/wp-content/uploads/2017/04/facebookLogo-small.png[/img][/url][/center]

[center][color=#FF0000][b]Latest Version required - 1.9.32.0.8[/b][/color][/center]

Essential characters are persons that, at some point during in The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim, cannot be killed in any way whatsoever. If their health is depleted, they fall to one knee, shortly recovering completely.

Essential Housecarls, short EH, is a simple mod that changes all Housecarls to essential so they can not be killed. You can choose between Vanilla only, Hearthfire only or both.


Download the file with NMM
Choose in the NMM Installer which version you want
Ready to play


It would be awesome if you upload screenshots from your housecarls. With and without mods to change the appearance. If you have some mods who change the appearance please provide the mod name. I like mods who make them more "beautiful". Thanks :)


[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49037/]Improved Lower Hrothgar[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33637/]Sapphire Archery Necklace and Ring for Hunters[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33508/]Hearthfire Items Chest - Materials for building your House[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32927/]Monaghan Camp - A Hunter's Shack[/url]
author: Valixx
